name: Josefin Sans
description: The idea of this typeface is to be geometric, elegant, with a vintage feeling, for use at larger sizes. It is inspired by geometric sans serif designs from the 1920s. The x-height is half way from baseline to cap height, an unusual proportion. There is a sister family, Josefin Slab In December 2019, it was updated with a Variable Font "Weight" axis. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/josefinsans .
author: Santiago Orozco
